mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER ( USER_ID, PASSWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL, BRTHDY, MBTLNUM, SEX, SNS_PROVIDER, USER_SE, REG_IP, REG_ID, REG_DT, UPDT_ID, UPDT_IP, UPDT_DT, LAST_LOGIN_IP, LAST_LOGIN_DT ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{passwd}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{brthdy}, #{mbtlnum}, #{sex}, #{snsProvider}, #{userSe}, #{regIp}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{updtId}, #{updtIp}, #{updtDt}, #{lastLoginIp}, #{lastLoginDt} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , USER_NAME , PASSWD , EMAIL , BRTHDY , MBTLNUM , SEX , USER_SE , USER_SE , LOGIN_ERR_CNT , LOGIN_RESTRICTED FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND PASSWD = #{passwd}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET LAST_LOGIN_DT = #{lastLoginDt}, LAST_LOGIN_IP = #{lastLoginIp}, LOGIN_CNT = LOGIN_CNT +1 WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
